mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post(title, content, map_idx, member_id) VALUES( #{title}, #{content}, #{mapIdx}, #{memberId} )
mapper.select: SELECT post.title AS "title", post.content AS "content", post.member_id AS "memberId", post.map_idx AS "mapIdx" FROM map JOIN post on map.idx = post.map_idx AND map.latitude=#{lat} AND map.longtitude=#{lng}
